transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello

Customer: Hello, bataiyega toh.

Executive: Ji [unintelligible] mam. Mam maine ek mahine pehle, ek mahine se jyada ho gaya apna Diamond Trust Safe ke naam se IndiaMART chalu kiya tha.

Customer: Hmm.

Executive: Thik hai mam? Aur uske baad se abhi tak jo mere paas mein jitni bhi leads aa rahi hai, woh saari ki saari inquiries wali aa rahi hai aur dusri baat ya toh jyadatar number off hote hai ya invalid number hote hai. Toh abhi tak mam koi aisi leads nahi hai jisko main matlab customer se baat karke apna jo bhi mera business hai usko sale kar sakta.

Executive: Sir aap ek kaam karo aap. Hai na? Main na aapko ek video meet ka link join kar rahi hu. Yeh last time aap join karo aur is time special yeh wali specific lagti hai na suspicious, hum turant ke turant aapka refund proceed karwa denge. Thik hai? Refund mein lekin 14 se 15 din lagenge aane mein, even jyada bhi lag sakte hai aane mein. Thik hai? Toh aapne October 2025 mein catalog liya tha, right? October, November ka paisa kat ke aapko jitna paisa hai woh mil jayega wapas.

Customer: Kya, kya matlab mam?

Executive: October sir use kiya hai, October ka paisa kat ke.

Customer: Mam use kiya hai maine, aap meri baat suniye, maine apna jo paisa lagaya tha mam, wapas lene ke liye nahi lagaya tha, maine business karne ke liye.

Executive: Sir aapko already explain kar chuki hu, main yeh bhi explain kar chuki hu, ek bar TrustSeal karke dekh lo, kai bar clients ko nahi milta hai. MDC mein business woh TrustSeal mein invest karte hai, aapke bhi brother ne kiya hai, unko ek bar pucho toh sahi unko MDC mein kitna mila. Aap mujhe unka number do aapke samne feedback leti hu main.

Customer: Main pehle bhi chala chuka hu mam, pehle aisa mere sath nahi hua jo abhi ab ho raha hai. Sir aisa nahi hai ki main ki mere parivar mein ya main jitne bhi TrustSafe ke naam se hai woh sab ke sab mere parivar se hai. Dekhiye yeh yeh mujhe Vishwas Safe hua, Balaji Safe hua, woh Safety Vishwas hua, Hindustani Vishwas hua, New Hindustani Vishwas hua, yeh sab ke sab mere parivar se hai.

Executive: [inaudible]

Customer: Hello

Executive: Sir dekho main aapko video meet ka link de rahi hu. Aap ek bar join kar lo. Main dekh leti hu. Whether aapke customers aap sahi bol rahe ho ya galat bol rahe ho, woh mujhe dekh kar pata chalega.

Customer: Main aapko bata raha hu na kya aapko kaise pata chalega. Aapke nahi nahi nahi meri ek second meri baat suniye.

Executive: Sir main aapka access nahi le sakti hu is wajah se main video meet.

Customer: Meri profile aap khud check kijiye aur usme yeh bhi dekhiye na ki maine.

Executive: Sir profile nahi, sir hume access nahi hai.

Customer: Aapko yeh dekh lijiye ki maine ab se kitne customers se baat ki hai aur kis kis se meri baat hui hai, aap unse ek bar contact kijiye.

Executive: Wahi toh bol rahi hu aap.

Customer: Nahi, contact karna padega kyunki mere paas login ID password nahi hai. Aap samjho toh sir aap samajh bhi toh nahi rahe ho. Aapko main itna sab bol chuki hu, aapko refund chahiye toh hum refund kara dete hai aur kya kare? 14 se 15 din tak mein lagega mam.

Executive: Koi baat nahi.

Customer: 14 se 15 din kyun lagega? Jab maine ek second mein maine pay kiya tha. 14 se 15 din kyun abhi refund hone mein lagega?

Executive: Sir refund aane mein time lag sakta hai na. Main aapko kal ko bol du kal refund aa jayega toh aise kaise aa jayega? Refund aa jayega aapke account mein. Myntra ya kabhi online se shopping karte hai woh bhi website yeh bolti hai bhai 7 se 14 din lagte hai. Beshak woh do din mein refund de de. Par bolti toh yahi hai na.

Customer: Toh phir abhi aapne kya bola tha ki 7 se 14 din lagenge, ho sakta hai usse jyada lag jaye.

Executive: Ho sakta hai ki shayad 20 din bhi lag jaye par refund aa jayega. Yeh meri surety hai. Aapko refund chahiye na toh I am ready to give you refund.

Customer: Mujhe kabhi kitne ka cut ho gaya monthly mera?

Executive: Sir monthly aapka sir woh toh deduction ke baad hi pata chalega, main aapko bata dungi. Maine meeting link bheji hai aap ek bar join kar lo please.

Customer: Nahi main main abhi video bhi nahi kar sakta main.

Executive: Sir jab join hi nahi kar sakte toh phir main issue kaise resolve karaun bataiye aap mujhe. Kya ji Muskan aap aise issue resolve kara do main join kar raha hu. Yeh batao. Toh main aapko ek ek dedh ghante baad call karta hu main free ho kar.

Executive: Ha ya toh aap join karo toh mujhe pata chale ki issue aise resolve ho payega. Ha join karta hu toh banao.

Customer: Kya?

Customer: Main join karta hu main.

Executive: Ha join karo aap pehle video meet.

Customer: Ha ho gaya.

Executive: Thik hai ji. Phir aap usse kya bolte hai screen share karna aur jo number jo aap jis executive se baat kar rahe hai usne aapki call ko hold kar rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is receiving irrelevant buyleads.

- Most leads have invalid or switched-off numbers.

- Wants to sell his business through IndiaMART.

- Wants to know monthly deduction amount.



Resolution:

- Executive shared a video meet link.

- Offered a refund, processing time 14-15 days.

- Explained refund processing time can vary.



Next Steps: 

- Customer agreed to join video meet later.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, refund, video meet, trustseal
